description: When you gain a random FA, draw 3 cards and select one
conviction.name: Romantic

description: At the start of the Settlement phase gain +1 endeavor
cooking.name: Cooking

description: Whenever a survivor dies, gain 1 random basic resource
death.name: Cannibalize

description: All Surivors gain the **Embolden** survival action.
**Embolden**: Once per round, if you haven't any +1 Str tokens, spend 1 survival to gain +1 Str token. When you are knocked down loose all Str tokens.
embolden.name: Embolden

description: All survivors gain **Encourage** survival action.
**Encourage**: Once per round, if standing spend 1 survival to call out a non-deaf survivor. They stand if knocked down.
encourage.name: Encourage

description: Once per settlement phase, if the survivors return victorious, gain 1 random basic resource.
filleting table.name: Filleting Table

description: When a survivor uses the Synchronized Strike SFA, reroll missed attack rolls once
forbidden dance.name: Forbidden Dance

description: When using Synchronized Strike FA, the attack assist may spend 1 survival to change a monster's R to R Failure before any wound attempts
heart_flute.name: Heart Flute

description: When rolling on intimacy table, roll twice and pick 1 result
newlife.name: Protect the Young

description: All Surivors gain the **Overcharge** survival action.
**Overcharge**: If you have any +1 Str token, you may spend 1 survival to remove of them and gain devastating 1 to your next attack this round.
overcharge.name: Overcharge

description: At the start of a survivor's act, they may decide to skip their act and Run Away
After a hunt event is resolved, a survivor may Run Away
pictograph.name: Pictograph

description: Add +2 to all Brain Trauma Rolls.
society.name: Accept Darkness

description: When a survivor innovates, draw an additional 2 innovation cards to choose from
symposium.name: Symposium

description: At the start of each settlement phase add 1 scrap resource to storage
the knowledge worm.name: The Knowledge Worm

description: **Song of the Brave**: During Overwhelming Darkness story event each non-deaf survivor may select the Path of the Brave
**The Knowledge Worm**: survivors with 10+ insanity, "A Gracious Host"
**War room**: Quarries can't move off the hunt board. If survivors would need to move backwards roll 1d10, on 4+ they don't.
**Settlement Watch**: Survivors gain +2 survival when they depart for a Nemesis encounter or Special Showdown
**Sauna Shrine**: When departing for a nemesis encounter or special showdown, gain +10 survival.
**Radiating Orb**: Survivors with a constellation gain +1 survival
**Family**: a newborn survivor inherits the surname of one of the parents, their weapon type and 1/2 their weapon proficiency.
**Umbilical Bank**: You may add 1 Life String strange resource to the storage.
**Bloodline**: inherit the following from parents: *The Oracle 's Eye, Iridescent Hide or Pristine ability. *1 Surname. *Half of the parent 's weapon proficiency levels, rounded up.
**Empire**: gain **Pristine** ability
**Pristine**: when you suffer a dismembered severe injury, ignore it and gain 1 bleeding token instead.
**Final Fighting Art**: Once per showdown you may select an AI card from the discard or wound pile and put it on top of AI deck
**Song of the Brave**: On arrival each non-deaf survivor may remove 1 negative attribute token
**Ultimate Weapon**: When you defeat a monster, gain 1 monster resource of your choice
**Crimson Candy**: At the start of the showdown each survivor gains * survival
